<h3 id="X9579">X(9579)&nbsp;=&nbsp;EXSIMILCENTER OF THESE CIRCLES: BEVAN AND 1ST JOHNSON-YFF</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^4+(b+c)*a^3-(b-c)^2*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2 : :
<br>
<b>
X(9579) = r*X(40)-2*(R+r)*X(1478)
</b>
<p>X(9579) lies on these lines: {1,30}, {3,5219}, {4,57}, {7,950}, {8,527}, {9,377}, {10,3474}, {11,3361}, {12,165}, {20,226}, {33,1448}, {34,990}, {35,4333}, {36,3560}, {40,1478}, {43,9553}, {46,3585}, {55,5290}, {56,1699}, {63,2475}, {65,971}, {142,452}, {225,1394}, {354,4355}, {355,2093}, {376,5714}, {382,942}, {386,2635}, {388,516}, {443,7308}, {497,4298}, {515,3340}, {529,4853}, {553,938}, {610,1901}, {908,4190}, {912,4338}, {920,7701}, {946,1420}, {962,7962}, {1012,5715}, {1155,1698}, {1419,3332}, {1445,6894}, {1454,1768}, {1467,5805}, {1473,4214}, {1479,3333}, {1656,5122}, {1695,9552}, {1706,3436}, {1708,6839}, {1754,1935}, {1777,3072}, {1837,3339}, {1839,2257}, {1885,1892}, {2003,5706}, {2476,4652}, {2478,5437}, {2654,4306}, {3091,3911}, {3220,4185}, {3306,5046}, {3338,3583}, {3434,6762}, {3452,6904}, {3475,4314}, {3476,4301}, {3485,4297}, {3486,3671}, {3487,3529}, {3522,5226}, {3576,4299}, {3577,5553}, {3612,4316}, {3616,5556}, {3624,3824}, {3627,5722}, {3663,5716}, {3679,3927}, {3729,7270}, {3817,7288}, {3830,5708}, {3832,5435}, {3839,5704}, {3916,5705}, {3925,5234}, {3928,6734}, {3947,5218}, {4311,5603}, {4313,5059}, {4331,7273}, {4858,5342}, {4901,5300}, {5119,5270}, {5177,5745}, {5249,5436}, {5252,5762}, {5433,7988}, {5555,7091}, {5709,6923}, {5812,6282}, {6173,8544}, {6692,6919}, {6705,6844}</p>
<p>
X(9579) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (40,6850), (1697,388), (3340,4295), (3486,3671), (7330,6917)<br>
X(9579) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4,4292,57), (7,3146,950), (10,3474,5128), (20,226,3601), (40,1478,9578), (46,3585,5587), (65,5691,5727), (382,942,3586), (908,4190,5438), (946,4293,1420), (1478,1770,40), (1836,7354,1), (3474,5229,10), (3487,3529,4304), (4312,5691,65), (5249,6872,5436), (6917,7330,5587)<br></p>
